  • MPD
  • View page source

MPDÔÉÅ

  1. Enter the SSID and passphrase of the AP where, DTIM in the AP is set to 1.

  2. To automatically load the signed firmware image for MPD application, select the MPD tab as shown in Figure 16.

  3. For all the modes, the Keep Alive Wake time is fixed as 2 in the application. This time is the time window in milliseconds during which Talaria TWO will wait in receive mode before going to sleep.

Figure 16: MPD tab

Note: Check the Show checkbox to see the passphrase value.
